input:
- Project: University voting system
- Feature: Signup + email verification
- DB: SQLite
- Deadline: 2025-12-05

output.title: Project: University voting system
output.summary: This project is a university voting system with a signup and email verification feature. It uses SQLite as the database and targets a deadline of 2025-12-05. The focus is on secure registration and reliable vote storage. Implementation should prioritize simple deployment and data integrity.

input:
Notes:
• Keep login page minimal
• Forgot password via email
• Passwords hashed
• Add admin panel for results

output.title: Keep login page minimal
output.summary: Design a minimal login page that supports email-based password reset. Ensure passwords are stored hashed for security. Provide an admin panel to view and manage results. The architecture should balance simplicity and secure handling of credentials.

input: Paragraph input: The team needs to automate summarizing meeting notes and converting bullet lists into JSON for analytics. It should handle multiple small inputs and produce consistent JSON outputs. Output must include a short summary and key-value extraction.

output.title: Automate summarizing meeting notes
bullets: Convert bullet lists into JSON for analytics
Include short summary and key-value extraction
output.summary: The goal is to automate summarization of meeting notes and transform bullet lists into JSON for downstream analytics. The system must handle many small inputs and produce consistent JSON structures including a brief summary and extracted key-value pairs. Reliability and formatting consistency are priorities. This enables easier analysis and integration with other tools.

structured.goal: summarize notes and convert bullets to JSON
structured.requirements: handle multiple small inputs, produce consistent JSON
